divs: sighting detailswent outside to smoke at 9:20 pm looked up and saw a bright red\orange sphere hovering over the hills southwest of medford oregon. it was a cloudy sky, the object was below the clouds. i watched the object for a while to see if it had blinking lights like a plane but the object didnt appear to be moving. suddenly the object moved and appeared in a different location (approx a half mile)and after about 10 seconds the object darted back to its original location. this happened a couple of times. i ran inside to alert some friends, we tried to get a picture but the object suddenly dissapeared, just blinked out of existence. at about 9:45 pm the sky started to clear, there were absolutly no bright stars in the area of the object.
trends: There have been 34 other sightings in Medford
There were no other sightings in Medford on or around May 18th 2011
